glsa.title: Vixie cron: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in Vixie cron, allowing local attackers to conduct symlink attacks.

background.p: Paul Vixieâ€™s cron daemon, a fully featured crond implementation.

description.p: Vixie cron contains a race condition relating to atime and mtime values of temporary files.

impact.p: A local attacker could change the modification time of files, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition via a symlink attack.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Vixie cron users should upgrade to the latest version:
